flowRoot.flowPara: Date chooser is displayed when the date field is focused.
Date chooser hides once a valid date has been entered. Date options are shown while a valid date is present - they hide when the date is cleared or edited.
Search options are displayed as tags in the search bar. They can be dismissed individually or as a whole.
Search options can be accessed from the search bar drop down.
Other search filters:
Date list is displayed when select dates button is pressed.
When "Select Dates..." button is pressed:
Button is replaced by a focused entry field.
Fuzzy date list and options expand into position.
The What list is closed, if it's open.
Pressing the calendar button replaces the fuzzy date list with a date picker.
Dates from the list are treated as being fuzzy. Dates entered into the field or with the date picker are treated as being exact.
Once a date has been selected, the button is restored, indicating the selected date filter.
Pressing the entered date allows a different one to be selected.
The clear button returns the button to its default state.
Default Search Bar
Date Filters
File Type Filters
Filter Display
The What button is replaced witha list when pressed. Selecting an item hides the list and replaces it with the button, which indicates if any file types have been selected.
Pressing the When button also closes the What list.
Search options can be accessed from the search bar drop down.
Remote

text.tspan: Remote location - only searching the current folder

flowRoot.flowPara: If in Other locations view, computer:/// or network:///, string reads:
Searching locations only
Searching devices only
Searching network locations only
No search options - it only matches on the name, and there are no filters available.
Alternative locations
kitty pics
kitty pics
If a search is taking a while, a spinner is displayed.
Search subfolders defaults to off, but is sensitive. If turned on, the label below the search bar should update - "Remote location - recursive search may take longer than usual"
kitty pics
Search toggle is insensitive.
If a file type has been selected, relevant property fields are displayed.
